question.question: Why does Priya still need to go to  the shop?
options: She wants to buy some clothes.
She is hungry and thirsty.
She hasn’t bought food for the journey.
She needs some bottles of water.
question.answer: The roads were hardly passable because of the rain.

question.question: Why does Amal believe snacks are necessary?
options: He doesn’t want to share his snacks.
No food is allowed on the bus.
Teachers will be hungry and thirsty.
The trip will last several hours.
question.answer: The trip will last several hours.

question.question: What did the teacher emphasise about the bus departure?
options: It will not wait for  students who are late.
It will  leave just a few minutes after  6.30am.
The gate will be closed.
It will wait for the teachers who arrive late.
question.answer: It will not wait for  students who are late.

question.question: Why does Priya say she must wake up much earlier?
options: She has to meet Amal.
She needs extra time to buy snacks.
She has to catch the early bus to school.
The meeting time is unusually early.
question.answer: The meeting time is unusually early.

question.question: Why does this year’s trip seem especially important?
options: The previous one didn’t take place.
Priya is going to travel by bus for the first time.
The students will stay in Galle overnight.
Amal has never seen the sea before.
question.answer: The previous one didn’t take place.
